snippet.title: The First Descendant - Official Release Window Cinematic Trailer | Game Awards 2023
snippet.description:
As revealed during The Game Awards 2023, The First Descendant gets a release window and a new cinematic trailer. This new trailer for the third-person co-op action RPG looter shooter features Descendants Valby and her team in battle as they face off against two massive Colossi enemies, the importance of cooperative gameplay, and more. The First Descendant will be available on PC (Steam), PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X/S, and Xbox One in summer 2024.

In The First Descendant, players become a Descendant whose mission is to combat against alien invaders – The Vulgus who crossed dimensions over 100 years ago and brought with them the devastating Colossi and destruction– for the survival of humanity and to protect Albion and the continent of Ingris.
